statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data;
SELECT city, state, country FROM geographic_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customer_data JOIN geographic_data ON customer_data.location_id = geographic_data.location_id;
SELECT customer_name, state FROM customer_data JOIN geographic_data ON customer_data.location_id = geographic_data.location_id WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, count(*) as num_customers FROM customer_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING num_customers > 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM geographic_data;
SELECT location_id, longitude, state FROM geographic_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT city, state, country FROM geographic_data WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT location_name FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;

SELECT customer_name, location_name FROM Customer JOIN CustomerLocation ON Customer.customer_id = CustomerLocation.customer_id JOIN Location ON CustomerLocation.location_id = Location.location_id WHERE Customer.customer_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT customer_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Customer JOIN CustomerLocation ON Customer.customer_id = CustomerLocation.customer_id JOIN Location ON CustomerLocation.location_id = Location.location_id ORDER BY location_id ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Customer c JOIN CustomerLocation cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id JOIN Location l ON cl.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location_name FROM Customer c LEFT JOIN CustomerLocation cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id LEFT JOIN Location l ON cl.location_id = l.location_id;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location_name, longitude FROM Customer c JOIN CustomerLocation cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id JOIN Location l ON cl.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.latitude > 40.0;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city, state, country FROM customers INNER JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York');
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, location_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, phone_number, city FROM customers JOIN customer_location ON customers.customer_id = customer_location.customer_id JOIN locations ON customer_location.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email, city, country FROM customers JOIN customer_location ON customers.customer_id = customer_location.customer_id JOIN locations ON customer_location.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_location WHERE location_id = 3);

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_customer ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_customer.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
